item.title: Building a 100% Local MCP Client
item.description: Learn how to build a Model Context Protocol (MCP) client that runs entirely locally, using LlamaIndex, Ollama, and LightningAI. This guide walks you through creating an MCP-powered agent that can connect to tools and data sources while maintaining complete privacy and control.
